name.ja: <ruby>砂<rt>さ</rt></ruby><ruby>塵<rt>じん</rt></ruby>の<ruby>大<rt>おお</rt></ruby><ruby>竜<rt>たつ</rt></ruby><ruby>巻<rt>まき</rt></ruby>

requirement.en: When your opponent draws a card, when your opponent Sets a Spell/Trap Card, or when an opponent's monster declares an attack.

effect.en: Destroy 1 Spell/Trap Card on your opponent's field. Then, you can Set 1 Spell/Trap Card from your hand to your field.
